title: The lamentacion of a synner, made by ye most vertuous Ladie, Quene Caterin, bewayling the ignoraunce of her blind life: set furth and put in print at the instaunt desire of the righte gracious ladie Caterin duchesse of Suffolke, [and] the earnest requeste of the right honourable Lord, William Parre, Marquesse of North Hampton
author: Catharine Parr, Queen, consort of Henry VIII, King of England, 1512-1548.
publicationDate: the v. day of Nouember, in the yere of our Lord. 1547
publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne ouer agaynste the conduyte by Edwarde Whitchurche,
notes: Preface by William Cecil, Baron Burghley.
Running title reads: The lamentacion of a sinner.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
